body_html:
hey guys,
im facing the same issue. Is savedmodel the recommended way to export from tensorflow ? OTOH, I do see a commit about adding this support to android.

We are seeing too many options here:

  1. freezing - #12319
  2. savedmodelbuilder - #12750 (which doesnt look to load on android)
  3. convert_variables_to_constants - tensorflow/models#38 (not sure if this saves with all the values)
  4. tf.train.export_meta_graph - https://www.tensorflow.org/api_guides/python/meta_graph (is this the same as freezing) ?
  5. optimize_for_inference - thtrieu/darkflow#286 . However, they wrote their own save function and graph function
  6. https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/xla/tfcompile
  7. Go directly to Keras - http://blog.stratospark.com/creating-a-deep-learning-ios-app-with-keras-and-tensorflow.html

Pretty puzzled on what is the production-ready way to do this.
body_text:
hey guys,
im facing the same issue. Is savedmodel the recommended way to export from tensorflow ? OTOH, I do see a commit about adding this support to android.
We are seeing too many options here:

freezing - #12319
savedmodelbuilder - #12750 (which doesnt look to load on android)
convert_variables_to_constants - tensorflow/models#38 (not sure if this saves with all the values)
tf.train.export_meta_graph - https://www.tensorflow.org/api_guides/python/meta_graph (is this the same as freezing) ?
optimize_for_inference - thtrieu/darkflow#286 . However, they wrote their own save function and graph function
https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/xla/tfcompile
Go directly to Keras - http://blog.stratospark.com/creating-a-deep-learning-ios-app-with-keras-and-tensorflow.html

Pretty puzzled on what is the production-ready way to do this.
body:
hey guys,
im facing the same issue. Is savedmodel the recommended way to export from tensorflow ? OTOH, I do see a [commit](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/ca6b88eb95b089010a1b970e0de7398195b5bcca) about adding this support to android.

We are seeing too many options here:
1. freezing - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12319  
2. savedmodelbuilder - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12750 (which doesnt look to load on android)  
3. convert_variables_to_constants - https://github.com/tensorflow/models/issues/38 (not sure if this saves with all the values)  
4. tf.train.export_meta_graph - https://www.tensorflow.org/api_guides/python/meta_graph (is this the same as freezing) ?  
5. optimize_for_inference - https://github.com/thtrieu/darkflow/issues/286 . However, they wrote their own save function and graph function  
6. https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/xla/tfcompile  
7. Go directly to Keras - http://blog.stratospark.com/creating-a-deep-learning-ios-app-with-keras-and-tensorflow.html

Pretty puzzled on what is the production-ready way to do this.
